use.js(12,12): error TS7006: Parameter 'wrap' implicitly has an 'any' type.

    var ex = require('./ex')
                     ~~~~~~

    var crunch = new ex.Crunch(1);
    crunch.n

    /**

==== ex.js (0 errors) ====
    export class Crunch {
        /** @param {number} n */
        constructor(n) {
            this.n = n
        }
        m() {
            return this.n
        }
    }
